verses.verse: And the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> of the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>, came near <WH7126>, and spake <WH1696> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872>, and before <WH6440> the princes <WH5387>, the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>:

And they said <WH559>, The LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> my lord <WH113> to give <WH5414> the land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> by lot <WH1486> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: and my lord <WH113> was commanded <WH6680> by the LORD <WH3068> to give <WH5414> the inheritance <WH5159> of Zelophehad <WH6765> our brother <WH251> unto his daughters <WH1323>.

And if they be married <WH802> to any <WH259> of the sons <WH1121> of the other tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, then shall their inheritance <WH5159> be taken <WH1639> from the inheritance <WH5159> of our fathers <WH1>, and shall be put <WH3254> to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> whereunto they are received: so shall it be taken <WH1639> from the lot <WH1486> of our inheritance <WH5159>.

And when the jubile <WH3104> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall be, then shall their inheritance <WH5159> be put <WH3254> unto the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> whereunto they are received: so shall their inheritance <WH5159> be taken away <WH1639> from the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of our fathers <WH1>.

And Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to the word <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, The tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> hath said <WH1696> well.

This is the thing <WH1697> which the LORD <WH3068> doth command <WH6680> concerning the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765>, saying <WH559>, Let them marry <WH802> to whom they think <WH5869> best <WH2896>; only to the family <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of their father <WH1> shall they marry <WH802>.

So shall not the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> remove <WH5437> from tribe <WH4294> to tribe <WH4294>: for every one <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep <WH1692> himself to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of his fathers <WH1>.

And every daughter <WH1323>, that possesseth <WH3423> an inheritance <WH5159> in any tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, shall be wife <WH802> unto one <WH259> of the family <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of her father <WH1>, that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may enjoy <WH3423> every man <WH376> the inheritance <WH5159> of his fathers <WH1>.

Neither shall the inheritance <WH5159> remove <WH5437> from one tribe <WH4294> to another <WH312> tribe <WH4294>; but every one <WH376> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep <WH1692> himself to his own inheritance <WH5159>.
Even as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so did <WH6213> the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765>:

For Mahlah <WH4244>, Tirzah <WH8656>, and Hoglah <WH2295>, and Milcah <WH4435>, and Noah <WH5270>, the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765>, were married <WH802> unto their father's <WH1730> brothers' sons <WH1121>:

And they were married <WH802> into the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>, and their inheritance <WH5159> remained in the tribe <WH4294> of the family <WH4940> of their father <WH1>.

These are the commandments <WH4687> and the judgments <WH4941>, which the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho <WH3405>.
